title: Coronation Street spoilers: Daniel cheats with Bethany as Sinead dies
text:
Daniel Osbourne (Rob Mallard) hs had a rough couple of months in Coronation Street, what with him having learned that wife Sinead Tinker (Katie McGlynn) is going to die and, as his wife’s death inches closer, he seeks comfort in Bethany Platt (Lucy Fallon) once more during the coming episodes.

Sinead has a visit from her palliative care nurse, so Daniel takes the opportunity to pop out for some milk. However, whilst doing so, he spots Kirk (Andrew Whyment), Beth (Lisa George) and Craig (Colson Smith) wearing festive jumpers and, when he realises they’re on there way to visit Sinead, he’s left horrified, as he believes she’s far too ill to partake in their surprise Christmas.

However, when Sinead learns of her friends’ plans, she thinks it’s a great idea, and thus she joins Ken (William Roache), Tracy (Kate Ford), Beth, Kirk and Craig for a festive meal — much to Daniel’s dismay.

After some tension, Daniel exits the meal and, later, Bethany finds him upset. He opens up to Bethany about his fears — and hoe he wishes he could change the situation both he and Sinead have found themselves in — before breaking down in her arms. Bethany embraces him — but what exactly will transpire?

While the extent of their embrace has not been revealed, Ken spots the two of them together — and he’s fuming. He orders Daniel to go return home to his dying wife, and Bethany heads off in tears — mortified by what has transpired.

Later in the week, Sinead passes away surrounded by her family — but will she discover the truth about Daniel and Bethany beforehand?

One to watch: Monday 21st October at 8:30pm on ITV.
